de.hlu.ust
Class BankStatement

java.lang.Object
  de.hlu.ust.Finance
      de.hlu.ust.BankStatement
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable
public class BankStatement
extends Finance
implements java.lang.Comparable

The BankStatement object stores all information about one line from the bank statement.

See Also:
Serialized Form

create

public void create()
            throws AppException
Cerate this bank statement. Making the new BankStatement persistent by saving the actual file as .old, set the id, append *this and write all bank statemnts.

Throws:
AppException - If the bank statement exists already or in case of read or write errors.
See Also:
create(int, int, int, int)

getAllBankStatements

public static BankStatement[] getAllBankStatements(int from,
                                                   int to)
                                            throws AppException
Get all bank statements from from month until to month in an array, sorted first by booking date and second by the bank statement.

Parameters:
from - int beginning month (1...12)
to - int until this month (1...12)
Returns:
BankStatement[] All bank statements found.

AppException - Ic case of read errors.
